text: Tom Natsworthy is the lead protagonist of Philip Reeve's Mortal Engines Quartet trilogy. ==Role== In the first novel of the Mortal Engines Quartet (known in the United States as The Hungry City Chronicles), Mortal Engines, he starts with an ordinary teenager who is an apprentice historian. ==In other media== In Mortal Engines, the movie adaptation of the first book, Natsworthy is portrayed by twenty-nine-year-old Irish actor Robert Sheehan as an adult. ==Related pages== * Mortal Engines Quartet ==References== Category:Predator Cities Category:Fictional British people
title: Tom Natsworthy
